name: @browser.style/content-card
description: Modular content card components for web applications with responsive layouts and flexible theming

scripts.build:layout: node -e "import { buildLayout } from '../layout/src/builder.js'; import path from 'path'; import { fileURLToPath } from 'url'; const __dirname = path.dirname(fileURLToPath(import.meta.url)); buildLayout({ configPath: path.join(__dirname, 'layout.config.json'), layoutsPath: path.join(__dirname, '../layout/layouts'), outputPath: path.join(__dirname, 'public/static/css/layout.css'), coreDir: path.join(__dirname, '../layout/core') }).then(() => console.log('✅ Layout CSS generated')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.test: node -e "import('fs').then(fs => { if (fs.existsSync('src/js/cards/index.js') && fs.existsSync('src/css/index.css')) console.log('✅ Package structure valid'); else throw new Error('Missing required files'); })"

author: Mads Stoumann
